Chapter Previous

class gstTranslateManipulator : public gstManipulator

Translatonal manipulator. This uses the PHANToM to translate an object, with force feedback. When active, the manipulator generates a damping effect as the object is translated. The PHANToM also must exceed a threshold force before the manipulator allows the object to be moved.

From header file: gstTranslateManipulator.h

Constructors and Destructors

~gstTranslateManipulatorDestructor.
Functions
getManipDamping Get damping constant of damper attached from gstPHANToM to translating object.

getSpringK Get stiffness of spring attached from gstPHANToM to translating object.
getThresholdForce Get threshold force to move object.

setSpringK Set stiffness of spring attached from gstPHANToM to translating object.
setThresholdForce Set threshold force to move object.
